comments.author: Alone055
comments.body: Is there anyone else who didn't expect KKR to win yesterday's match with such a huge margin?Â   To be honest, though I had picked KKR, I was worried they might lose as their batting wasn't so good initially but then Gurbaz and Rinku managed to stabilize the innings and made a good partnership later accompanied by Shardul.Their bowling was on another level last night. I was both happy and surprised.
